pkgmetadata.longdescription: Detect differential expression in microarray and proteomics datasets with the Power Law Global Error Model (PLGEM) // The Power Law Global Error Model (PLGEM) has been shown to faithfully model the variance-versus-mean dependence that exists in a variety of genome-wide datasets, including microarray and proteomics data. The use of PLGEM has been shown to improve the detection of differentially expressed genes or proteins in these datasets.
